entry.title: xjsdev/iorpc: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
entry.content: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.

entry.title: salarizadi/vertex-db: A lightweight, high-performance JavaScript/TypeScript database library for modern web applications. Supports in-memory data storage, persistent storage, and real-time data synchronization with flexible query capabilities.
entry.content: A lightweight, high-performance JavaScript/TypeScript database library for modern web applications. Supports in-memory data storage, persistent storage, and real-time data synchronization with flexible query capabilities.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: masonaviles/3D_keyboard: This is a modern 3D interactive keyboard viewer built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Spline. It's lightweight, responsive, and designed to run smoothly with zero backend setup.

entry.title: docdr22/robot-management-system: A powerful yet lightweight platform to develop, control, and monitor robots - drones, UAVs, arms, humanoids & more. Ideal for individuals, startups, and enterprises in robotics, manufacturing, research, defense, and automation. Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Vite.
entry.content: A powerful yet lightweight platform to develop, control, and monitor robots - drones, UAVs, arms, humanoids & more. Ideal for individuals, startups, and enterprises in robotics, manufacturing, research, defense, and automation. Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Vite.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more.
